Bookmarks: Attach post-it notes to the edge of a book or magazine to mark a specific page or paragraph for easy reference.
DIY Wind Chimes: Attach post-it notes to a piece of metal or wood to create a unique wind chime. The notes can be used to create different tones when the wind blows.
Indoor Plant Markers: Write the names of the plants on post-it notes and stick them in the soil of the pot to help identify the different types of plants in your indoor garden.
Gift Tags: Use post-it notes as temporary gift tags that can be easily removed after the recipient opens their present.
Labeling Desk Supplies: Use post-it notes to label different desk supplies such as pens, paperclips, and sticky notes, making it easier to find and organize your workspace.
